org.anarres.dhcp.common.address

Class AddressUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.anarres.dhcp.common.address.AddressUtils

  • public class AddressUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    All methods are big-endian (network-endian) and modify their arguments.
    See Also:
    InetAddresses
